Class ScaledRange

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Mutable<RangeChangedEvent.Handler,RangeChangingEvent.Handler>, MutableRange, Range, Cloneable
public class ScaledRange
extends BaseRange

Concrete implementation of BaseRange that can be scaled.
